summary: This module provides a suite of unit tests for the XLA Fully Sharded Data Parallel (FSDP) strategy in Lightning Fabric. The tests validate rank-related properties, proper handling of gradient clipping configuration errors, correct operation of backward synchronization control, policy settings, and optimizer setup validation for the XLA FSDP strategy.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the XLA FSDP strategy used for large-scale distributed training on XLA devices, ensuring that misconfigurations are caught early and that core functionalities behave as expected.
